top_stories.title: McKinsey and General Catalyst execs say the era of ‘learn once, work forever’ is over
top_stories.description: Calacanis, General Catalyst's Taneja, and McKinsey's Sternfels discussed how AI is reshaping technology and the labor force.
top_stories.author: Marina Temkin
top_stories.content: Calacanis, General Catalyst's Taneja, and McKinsey's Sternfels discussed how AI is reshaping technology and the labor force.

top_stories.title: Tencent Researchers Release Tencent HY-MT1.5: A New Translation Models Featuring 1.8B and 7B Models Designed for Seamless on-Device and Cloud Deployment
top_stories.description: Tencent Hunyuan researchers have released HY-MT1.5, a multilingual machine translation family that targets both mobile devices and cloud systems with the same training recipe and metrics. HY-MT1.5 consists of 2 translation models, HY-MT1.5-1.8B and HY-MT1.5-7B, supports mutual translation across 33 languages with 5 ethnic and dialect variations, and is available on GitHub and Hugging Face […] The post Tencent Researchers Release Tencent HY-MT1.5: A New Translation Models Featuring 1.8B and 7B...
top_stories.author: Michal Sutter
top_stories.content: Tencent Hunyuan researchers have released HY-MT1.5, a multilingual machine translation family that targets both mobile devices and cloud systems with the same training recipe and metrics. top_stories.title: EMQ announced the release of EMQX Enterprise v6.1.0
top_stories.description: New release adds durable, replayable MQTT streaming, native Parquet support for analytics pipelines, and enhanced multi-tenancy to support event-driven IoT and data workloads at scale EMQ, a global leader in MQTT messaging and IoT data infrastructure, today announced the release of EMQX Enterprise v6.1.0, the latest update to its MQTT platform. The... The post EMQ announced the release of EMQX Enterprise v6.1.0 first appeared on AI-Tech Park.

top_stories.title: Meta expands neural wristband tech to cars and accessibility at CES 2026
top_stories.description: Meta unveiled applications of its EMG-based neural wristband beyond smart glasses at CES 2026 in Las Vegas, partnering with Garmin for automotive controls and the University of Utah for accessibility research to expand wrist-based device interaction. Meta has developed electromyography (EMG) technology over several years, capturing electrical signals from wrist muscles to enable gesture controls. […]
top_stories.author: Emre Çıtak
